skins.selfIntroduction: I am the Iron Blood Navy's Z-class 1936-Type destroyer, Hermann K¨¹nne. I participated in Operation Weser¨¹bung, and met my end during the fierce engagements at Narvik. Things will be different this time around!
skins.acquisition: Z19 Hermann K¨¹nne, reporting for duty! Commander, I'm prepared to fight until the very end!
skins.login: Commander, skipping breakfast is bad for your body. I've prepared some cereal and toast for you; if you don't mind, would you like to eat together?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I must be more strict with myself now that I'm your secretary.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, if you're free, would you like to play with me?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, I prepared some watermelon for you. Open your mouth~ aah~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Please don't pick me up... I'm way too old for that...
